answers.answer: No they were not for me. I had a fairly easy pregnancy minus the diabetes and high blood pressure both that I was diagnosed with before pregnancy along with the thyroid problem. Just stick to your medication and everything will be fine.

My symptoms are way worse this time with hypothyroidism, but it probably has more to do with the fact that im having twins!  My doc checks my thyroid levels like every month to make sure I'm in a healthy range.

question: Is pregnancy symtoms worse with hypothyroidism?
title: pregnet with hypothyroidism
